step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You are placing your hands on your abdomen. Try to keep your elbows slightly bent and relaxed.
Great inhale through your nose! Remember to tighten your whole body muscles and visualize fluid moving to your chest.
Nicely done exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out.
Good start for the second rep, maintaining a comfortable position with hands on your abdomen.
You are placing your hands on your abdomen. Focus on keeping your elbows relaxed during this step.
Excellent inhale through your nose. Remember to engage your whole body muscles and visualize fluid moving towards your chest.
Well done exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. Focusing on visualizing fluid movement will enhance the lymphatic drainage benefits.
